class.name: SoundFont2
class.brief_description: A resource that holds a SoundFont 2 (.sf2) instrument bank.
class.description: [SoundFont2] wraps a SoundFont 2 file, which contains sampled instrument data used to synthesize MIDI audio. It is used by [AudioStreamMIDI] to provide the instrument sounds for MIDI playback. SoundFont files ([code].sf2[/code]) are automatically loaded by the engine's resource loader when placed in the project. They can also be loaded from raw byte data at runtime using [method load_from_buffer].

method.name: get_preset_list
load_from_buffer
method.description: Creates a new [SoundFont2] resource from a [PackedByteArray] containing raw SF2 file data. Returns [code]null[/code] on failure.
